evidence.text:
Person B: [Don’t forget to eat fruit. It will help your digestive system so your poop isn’t so hard.]
Person B: [And floss. You must floss. You won’t be able to see a dentist as easily in college.]

Person A: Is Dad coming home to see me before I leave?
Person B: [He doesn’t know yet.]
Person A: You know you were only born because I wanted a little brother and I wish you died in the womb.
Person A: Mom, can you not?

Person A: Bye-bye, [Nai Nai.]
Person A: [Nai Nai. I don’t need it.]
